questions.question: Do I select labs?
questions.answer: If you are from the faculty of Pharmacy, Allied health Science and medical then don't forget to select lab courses.

questions.question: Which courses should I select?
questions.answer: Select Courses in which you are currently enroll.

questions.question: Which documents are require?
questions.answer: Last 2 semester Fee voucher and enrollment card

questions.question: Which documents should I attach?
questions.answer: Last 2 semester Fee voucher and enrollment card

questions.question: How to fill this form
questions.answer: If you received clearance performa then fill the * require fields

questions.question: Which documents are require for clearance?
questions.answer: Last 2 semester Fee voucher and enrollment card

questions.question: I don't receive clarence performa
questions.answer: Wait for 3 days, and if you don't receive them, contact the examination department.

questions.question: What is the last date for submission?
From where I get the clarence performa
questions.answer: Submit the required documents, and you will receive it online.
